```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
install.packages("colorspace")
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)

library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
Plot_A = instacart%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = order_hour_of_day, group = order_hour_of_day, fill = order_hour_of_day)) + geom_histogram() + stat_bin(bins = 24) + labs(x = "Hour of the Day", title = "Items Ordered by hour of the day")

ggplotly(Plot_A)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
Plot_B = filter(instacart, aisle_id==1)%>%
  count(order_hour_of_day)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = order_hour_of_day, y=n, color = "red")) + geom_line() + geom_point()  + theme(legend.position="none") + labs(x = "Hour of the Day", y = "Items ordered", title = "Items Ordered by Hour of the day")

ggplotly(Plot_B)

```


### Chart C

```{r}
instacart_ggboxplot = 
 instacart %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(order_dow), y = days_since_prior_order, fill = as.factor(order_dow))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_classic() + 
  labs(x = "Day of Week", y = "Days Since Prior Order", title = "Days since Prior Order by Day of Week", fill = "Day")


ggplotly(instacart_ggboxplot)
```
